# Earth (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* | Aegir, Hel, Loki,<br>Skadi |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | Balinor, the Cults of the Dragon Below |
| | *Golarion:* | Abadar, [[Torag]] |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Moradin]], [[Obad-Hai]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* | Chislev, Reorx |
| | *Olympian:* | Demeter, Hades, [[Hephaestus]], Poseidon |
| | *Other:* | Taiia (destroyer aspect), Toldoth |
| | *Pharaonic:* | [[Anubis (Deity)\|Anubis]], Bast, Set |
| | *Toril:* | [[Abbathor]], [[Berronar Truesilver]], Clangeddin, Deep Duerra, [[Dugmaren Brightmantle]], [[Dumathoin]], Gorm Gulthyn, Haela Brightaxe, [[Laduguer]], Marthammor Duin, [[Moradin]], Sharindlar, Thard Harr, Vergadain |

**Granted Power:** You have mastery over earth, metal, and stone, can fire darts of acid, and command earth creatures.

- *Acid Dart (Sp):* As a standard action, you can unleash an acid dart targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. This acid dart deals 1d6 points of acid damage + 1 point for every two cleric levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
- *Acid Resistance (Ex):* At 6th level, you gain resist acid 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain immunity to acid.

**Earth Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Magic Stone (Spell)|Magic Stone]]****:** Three stones become +1 projectiles, 1d6 +1 damage.

**2** **[[Soften Earth and Stone (Spell)|Soften Earth and Stone]]****:** Turns stone to clay or dirt to sand or mud.

**3** **[[Stone Shape (Spell)|Stone Shape]]****:** Sculpts stone into any shape.

**4** **[[Spike Stones (Spell)|Spike Stones]]****:** Creatures in area take 1d8 damage, may be slowed.

**5** **[[Wall of Stone (Spell)|Wall of Stone]]****:** Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.

**6** **[[Stoneskin (Spell)|Stoneskin]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Ignore 10 points of damage per attack.

**7** **[[Elemental Body IV (Spell)|Elemental Body IV]]**** (earth only):** Turns you into a Huge elemental.

**8** **[[Earthquake (Spell)|Earthquake]]****:** Intense tremor shakes 80-ft.-radius.

   **[[Stoneskin, Greater (Spell)|Stoneskin, Greater]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Ignore 20 points of damage per attack.

**9** **[[Elemental Swarm (Spell)|Elemental Swarm]]**** (earth spell only):** Summons multiple elementals.
